mcq.statement: While patrolling the motorway, an NHMP officer observes a suspicious vehicle parked on the shoulder. What is the MOST appropriate course of action for the NHMP officer?

options.a: Ignore the vehicle unless it is causing an obstruction.
options.b: Continue patrolling and monitor the vehicle from a distance.
options.c: Request backup from local police before investigating the situation.
options.d: Approach the vehicle and inquire about the reason for stopping.
